features: Experience the Benefits of Hemp Seeds: 100% Natural Hemp Seed Oil is rich in omega-6 and omega-3 fatty acids, so your skin will look and feel extraordinary.

Exotic and Exciting: This luxurious body cream is scented with Green Tea and Pears, which will leave an alluring, romantic aroma on your skin. The smell is not too heavy, and since it contains no harsh chemicals, it will leave behind no residue.
Revitalize Your Skin: Acai Berry and Goji Berry combine with an essential extract blend that will balance, revitalize, and refresh your body from head to toe.

Enriched Moisturizer: Our exotic lotions contain Vitamins A, C, E, and B5, which will protect your skin from natural and environmentally triggered oxidants and elements. Your skin will feel nourished and healthy with these rich, conditioning creams.
Natural Ingredients, Natural Results: Hempz moisturizers contain no parabens, gluten, and are . They are Natural Hemp Seed Oil, and they are 100% Vegan.
body.description: Soften, Revitalize and Renew with this Exotic Green Tea Moisturizer: Your skin deserves the very best nutrients and ingredients, which is why Hempz is proud to offer you our enriching, smoothing body lotion with an essential extract blend of green tea, Asian pear, 100% pure, natural hemp seed oil, acai berry and goji berry. The warm, mysterious fragrance will be an added bonus to the cream’s ability to stimulate and regenerate your skin. From head to toe, your skin will renew its natural balance, leaving it healthier than ever with vitamins A, C, E and B5, which will also help protect your skin. Additionally, hemp seed is renowned for providing moisture without clogging your pores, and anti-aging characteristics, and shea butter and ginseng will add even more nourishing results. This 100% vegan lotion does not have any parabens, gluten, or THC, making it an ideal gift for any man or woman, whether for a birthday, Mother’s Day, or Christmas. Product Details: Exotic Herbal Body Moisturizer 100% Pure Natural Hemp Seed Oil with, Goji Berry, Acai Berry, Shea Butter and Ginseng Contains Vitamins A, C, E, and B5 100% Vegan Paraben, Gluten, and THC-free Available Sizes: 2.25 oz, 17 oz Fragrance: Green Tea and Asian Pear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I haven't used a Hempz I haven't liked!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this small bottle of Hempz because I wasn't sure if I was going to like or be sensitive to the scent. I have frequent migraines triggered by fragrances, but this was another Hempz winner. The scent is strong enough to be noticed but not overpowering, and I wish I had bought the bigger bottle. I love how moisturizing it is without being greasy. If you're looking for something that is fruity but not reminiscent of cheap teen dollar store fragrances, this is a great option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion & the scent so much I keep a large bottle of it at home and keep this smaller bottle in my purse. I receive lots of compliments when I use this. Very clean & fresh smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it love it love it
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about the scent but I went ahead and ordered it because my hands were so dry that they were starting to crack and bleed are used this the first day just twice once I got it and it blew me away with how good it is and on top of that it smells incredible and I got the travel size just to make sure so I’m not stuck with a scent or lotion that doesn’t work or smell good but I will definitely be getting the larger bottles and just filling up the travel size because I take it everywhere with me now it is so good all the cracks are gone my hands are silky smooth and I keep smelling my hands like a crazy person because they smell so good I highly recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific lotion in the perfect on the go size
reviews.reviewText: Not greasy at all. It's nice and thick but still absorbs well and really moisturizes. The small size is perfect to toss in my purse. The scent is light and soft, not overwhelming. Love this stuff!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I received this in travel size just before going away for the weekend. It has the most pleasant aroma; not too strong. The first use felt great! I have been using it for almost a week now, and my hands and arms are super soft. My only issue (not even a biggie) is that it is a bit difficult to squeeze out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Broke my arm it Removeds the tightness in my muscles
reviews.reviewText: I ruby arms down and face it relives the tightness in my muscles and gives 100% moisture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Refreshing Moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: My skin absorbers this lotion so quickly, it has a light moisturizing feel on my skin. When I put on before putting pants on doesn’t even make a mess. Also, it doesn’t leave a sticky feeling on my skin. My skin has never felt this refreshed before with any other moisturizer. With a light refreshing scent that doesn’t cause headaches. This is one of my top favorite moisturizers out there. Would definitely recommend to all of my friends

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I'm glad I tried the trial size first
reviews.reviewText: I almost took advantage of the full size buy one get half off the second bottle. I'm glad I didn't. I wanted the pineapple and melon because everyone was raving about the scent. But they didn't have it in trial size so I got the green tea and pear. It smells very nice and it went on smoothly and felt good at first. I noticed my hands did not stay moisturized for long. As a matter of fact, they felt kind of dry after an hour or two. I guess this just wasn't for me. I have dry skin, but not overly dry. Cerave moisturizing cream works great, but I wanted something with a nice scent. Maybe the age defying Hempz might work better for me, but I don't think I can return it after using the product. Plus some people were comparing the scent to baby powder, which I absolutely hate. Glad it works for some of you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 14, 2023
